text: Manouchehr Yazdi () is an Iranian teacher and pan-Iranist politician who served as a member of parliament from 1975 to 1979. Yazdi is a senior Pan- Iranist Party member. He resigned from Resurgence Party in June 1978. == References == * Category:Pan-Iranist Party politicians Category:Rastakhiz Party politicians Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian educators Category:People from Ardakan Category:Members of the 24th Iranian Majlis Category:Iranian nationalists
title: Manouchehr Yazdi
